CustomField.formula: CASE(FLOOR(MOD( Submit_for_Approval_Date__c - DATETIMEVALUE(DATE(1900, 1, 7)), 7)), 0, Submit_for_Approval_Date__c+3, 1, Submit_for_Approval_Date__c+3, 2, Submit_for_Approval_Date__c+3,3, Submit_for_Approval_Date__c+5, 4, Submit_for_Approval_Date__c+5, 5, Submit_for_Approval_Date__c+5, 6, Submit_for_Approval_Date__c+4,null)
CustomField.label: SendReminderEmailWeekdays
